description: [``botocore``] This release adds the ability to specify a linked account of the billing group for the custom line item resource.
[``botocore``] This release enhances service support to create quantum tasks and hybrid jobs associated with Braket Direct Reservations.
[``botocore``] This release adds the requirement to include the imageId parameter in the CreateEnvironmentEC2 API call.
[``botocore``] Including UPDATE_* states as a success status for CreateStack waiter.
[``botocore``] Adds support for custom color correction on channels using 3D LUT files.
[``botocore``] Update endpoint-rules client to latest version
